Operation 'post-getNotificationConfiguration' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Summary is adequate, but description is too vague about what 'details' are returned. Added specificity about required inputs (configuration ID) and output structure (NotificationConfigurationDetails object) to improve AI agent interpretability and help agents understand what data will be available.

data.current_description: Returns the details of the configuration of a notification subscription.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the complete configuration details of a specific notification subscription, including event types, endpoint URL, and authentication settings. Requires the notification configuration ID as input. Returns a NotificationConfigurationDetails object containing all subscription parameters.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate, but description is too vague about what 'details' are returned. Added specificity about required inputs (configuration ID) and output structure (NotificationConfigurationDetails object) to improve AI agent interpretability and help agents understand what data will be available.

message: Operation 'post-getNotificationConfigurationList' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Summary is clear, but description lacks specificity about the return format and structure. Added clarity about the list structure and what each element contains to help AI agents understand the response format and available data.

data.current_summary: Get a list of notification subscription configurations
data.current_description: Returns the details of the configurations of all of the notification subscriptions in the platform of the executing user.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all notification subscription configurations for the executing user's platform. Returns a list of NotificationConfigurationDetails objects, each containing the complete configuration for a subscription including event types, endpoint URLs, and authentication settings. No input parameters required.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear, but description lacks specificity about the return format and structure. Added clarity about the list structure and what each element contains to help AI agents understand the response format and available data.

message: Operation 'post-testNotificationConfiguration' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is adequate, but description lacks information about the response format and clarification that this is a non-destructive test operation. Added details about the return value (TestNotificationConfigurationResponse) and explicit note that the configuration is not modified, helping AI agents understand the operation's scope and effects.

data.current_description: Tests an existing notification subscription configuration. For each event type specified, a test notification will be generated and sent to the URL configured in the subscription specified.
data.description_suggestion: Tests an existing notification subscription configuration by sending test notifications to the configured endpoint. For each event type specified in the request, a test notification will be generated and delivered to the URL defined in the subscription. Returns a TestNotificationConfigurationResponse containing delivery status and results for each event type tested. This operation does not modify the subscription configuration.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate, but description lacks information about the response format and clarification that this is a non-destructive test operation. Added details about the return value (TestNotificationConfigurationResponse) and explicit note that the configuration is not modified, helping AI agents understand the operation's scope and effects.

message: Operation 'post-updateNotificationConfiguration' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is clear, but description has important caveats that could confuse AI agents about partial update behavior. Clarified that event type updates require complete specification while other fields support partial updates. Added information about the return value to help agents understand what data will be available after the update.

data.current_description: Updates an existing notification subscription configuration. If you are updating the event types, you must provide all event types, otherwise the previous event type configuration will be overwritten.
data.description_suggestion: Updates an existing notification subscription configuration with new settings. When modifying event types, all desired event types must be provided in the requestomitted event types will be removed from the configuration. Supports partial updates for other fields such as endpoint URL and authentication credentials. Returns the updated NotificationConfigurationDetails object reflecting all changes.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear, but description has important caveats that could confuse AI agents about partial update behavior. Clarified that event type updates require complete specification while other fields support partial updates. Added information about the return value to help agents understand what data will be available after the update.
